text:
Wow, it's fantastic...!
Is this the new costume?

Haha, of course.
Take your time and have a look.

The cuts on the torso are intricate...
It creates a beautiful silhouette...

Oh, it's not tape here, it's fastened with snaps...
And there's plenty of fabric... It seems to flutter, yet it's light...

The lining is not visible, but it's a nice design...
and it's also very moisture wicking and... comfortable to dance in.

As expected of Chiyuki, you understand these things...
I've learned something too.

...I'm sorry.
I got so moved, and I just...

When you see such wonderful work from the costume staff,
it makes me feel like I have to do my best as a pro too...!
